amendment.description: Amendment further defines how classified cyber threat intelligence may be shared and used, and adds an additional provision stipulating that classified threat intelligence may only be used, retained, or further disclosed by a certified entity only for cybersecurity purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-41 to further define how classified cyber threat intelligence may be shared and used, and adds an additional provision stipulating that classified threat intelligence may only be used, retained, or further disclosed by a certified entity only for cybersecurity purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 0 (Roll no. 111).
